question: Who has been recently conferred with the 29th Saraswati Samman Award?
explanation:
The famous Sindhi Writer and poet Vasdev Mohi has been chosen for the prestigious 29th Saraswati Samman Award. The Saraswati Samman Award is a famous award in the field of Literature, presented by the KK Birla Foundation. 
Vasdev Mohi is being conferred with this award for his short story collection named \'CHEQUE BOOK\'. The collection of short stories describes the sufferings and agonies of the marginalised section of the society. This was published in 2012 in Sindhi language.
Vasdev Mohi has recieved several other important national awards like Sahitya Akademi Award, Sindhi Sahitya Academy Award, Gangadhar Mehar National Award and Lifetime Achievement Award of Sindhi Academy.
